sentences.sentence: Money Never Sleeps slaps his oeuvre back to life.
sentences.translation: 《金钱永不眠》又将成为他的力作之一。

sentences.sentence: His whole oeuvre is quite extraordinary - if you pick out the best bits.
sentences.translation: 他的作品总的来说还是很出色的——如果你挑出那些最好的作品的话。

sentences.sentence: One of the films in ms Fisher's oeuvre was called "Dead by Dawn". That will not be HP's fate.
sentences.translation: Fisher女士的全部电影作品里有一部叫作《活不过天明》，这不该是惠普的命运。
